name: Discobolus
description:
Discobolus is a puzzle that overlaps two Sliding Block Puzzle games, one on top of the other. It is terribly simple, but solving it is another story.

Solving this puzzle has a prize, since, at the time of this writing, there is an active contest, where the winner is the first who solves the puzzle.

You can read the contest bases on the blog or directly on the game.
